author: benh
msg: "Fixed" the current semantics of session expiration for the slaves and
add a big comment in the master explaining this.

author: benh
msg: Allowed parsing of PIDs to possibly fail due to DNS failures.

author: benh
msg: Cleaned up master detector so that we can log the difference between a bad parse of the PID and a missing ephemeral znode.

author: benh
msg: Another attempt at fixing pid parsing issues, this time using gethostbyname2_r to deal with possible re-entrancy issues.
